sentences.en: "Tim Howard was 'Man Of The Match' and that was proof of how strong we were, " said David James, without flinching.
sentences.cn: 大卫詹姆斯没有任何畏惧的说：“蒂姆霍华德是比赛的救星，而这证明了我们的强大。”

sentences.en: Anne was fond of Tim, though he often annoyed her.
sentences.cn: 安妮喜欢蒂姆，虽然他经常使她心烦。

sentences.en: Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
sentences.cn: 别担心，蒂姆大叔，你将来由我们照顾。

sentences.en: I realize that I'm seeing Tim as he is in the world, with no reference to me at all.
sentences.cn: 我意识到我所看到的，是蒂姆在他的世界里的生活，而这个世界和我一点关系也没有。

sentences.en: My goodness, Tim, you have changed!
Now look here, Tim, there really is no need for that kind of reaction.
sentences.cn: 你听我说，蒂姆，你这种反应真的没必要。

sentences.en: Oh, Tim! I'm sorry but I have to dash.
sentences.cn: 哦，蒂姆！很抱歉，我得马上走。

sentences.en: Tim had dropped the letter in earlier.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆早些时候把信送来了。

sentences.en: Tim hemmed and hawed, but finally told his boss the truth.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆起初支支吾吾，但最终还是把真相告诉了老板。

sentences.en: Tim jumped to his feet. "Okay, let's go."
sentences.cn: 蒂姆一跃而起，“好了，我们走吧。”

sentences.en: Tim Munton becomes the new vice-captain.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·芒顿成为新的副队长。

sentences.en: Tim Powell is a former champion powerboat racer.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·鲍威尔曾是汽艇比赛冠军。

sentences.en: Tim was just arriving home from a long night on the town.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆在外面玩了一宿，刚刚到家。

sentences.en: Tim wondered how the devil they had managed it.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆想知道他们究竟是怎么做到的。

sentences.en: Tim, may I introduce you to my uncle's secretary, Mary Waller?
sentences.cn: 蒂姆，我来介绍一下，这位是我叔叔的秘书玛丽·沃勒。

sentences.en: Tim, this is awful. I know what you must think, but it's not so.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆，这可糟了。我知道你心里在想什么，但实际情况不是这样的。

phrases.tran_cn: 蒂姆·伯顿（美国著名导演）
